author: Krassimir Kossev
releaseNotes:
1.2.0 - major refactoring and optimizations
1.3.0 - added 'HIKING TOMZN DDS238-2 TS0601', 'AlwaysOn' and 'Optimizations' options
1.4.0 - debug & trace logging cleanup; initialize switch and energy automatic reporting mode; energy and switch are excluded from polling; debug loging is disabled and optimizations are enabled by default; switch digital/physical bug fixed; added driver version check
1.4.2 - missing Switch capability bug fix
1.4.3 2022-02-15 - added 'Tuya RC-RCBO Circuit Breaker'
1.4.4 2022-05-08 - added new fingerprints; [overwrite: true] explicit option for runIn timers; settings reset bug fix1.4.5 2022-05-24 - _TZ3000_5f43h46b XUELILI 16A UK; _TZ3000_r6buo8ba; _TZ3000_ksw8qtmt NOUS A1Z; _TZ3000_1h2x4akh Ajax/Zignito; _TZ3000_ky0fq4ho DIN Relay; GreenPower cluster 0xF2 fix; childLock, ledMode, powerOnState configuration commands; importURL is the development branch
1.4.6 2022-06-04 - _TZ3000_gjnozsaz;  on/off switches for power, amperage, voltage and energy reporting (logs+Events); device display name in all logs
